system.notes: Environmentally Sealed, gives +30 to resist extreme environmental conditions and has 8 hours of air. Contains internal vox, mag-boots, and photo-visor. -10 to Agility and Further -10 for tests requiring fine manipulation using the gauntlets. Counts as AP 10 vs Flame/Energy weapons.

description.value: Environmentally Sealed, gives +30 to resist extreme environmental conditions and has 8 hours of air. Contains internal vox, mag-boots, and photo-visor. -10 to Agility and Further -10 for tests requiring fine manipulation using the gauntlets. Counts as AP 10 vs Flame/Energy weapons.
